column1: * 1920 - Father Christmas writes a Letters from Father Christmas to J.R.R. Tolkiens children.
* 1941 - Father Christmas writes a Letters from Father Christmas to J.R.R. Tolkiens children.
* 1951 - Author Charles de Lint is born.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age is released in Japan.
* 2009 - War of the Fantasy Worlds is published.
